body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bell Autos. My name is Louis Bell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Anna Bell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Anna. Can you please provide me with your phone number, with each digit spelled out?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. Two zero zero, five five five, eight eight one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your email address, with each character spelled out?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. A, n, n, a, b, e, l, l, at, g, m, a, i, l, dot, c, o, m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Anna. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Anna. Thank you for reaching out to Bell Autos. Have a great day!
